detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in mesh with embroidery, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in a contrasting colour, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Backpack in grained imitation leather with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a handle and drawstring at the top. Imitation suede flap with a magnetic fastener. Unlined. Size 15x28x35 cm.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat in soft, felted wool containing some cashmere. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders and wide, long sleeves with cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal, flap side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a wider neckline and flounce at the top and over the shoulders. Concealed elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with gathers around the neckline and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam and drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Softly draping, lightweight skirt in double-flounced tiers for added volume and movement. Concealed zip at the back. Chiffon lining.
Leggings in stretch twill, one pair with an all-over print. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a fake fly.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with lace-trimmed hems. High, frill-trimmed, elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring.
Short dress in soft, patterned viscose with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist and long sleeves. Unlined.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured soles.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a print motif on the front, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a drawstring waist and flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Leggings in washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Short dress in a slightly stretchy weave with a boat neck, concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft, closely-knit cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles with a low heel.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a vest top and shortie briefs in spotted mesh. Vest top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Shortie briefs with overlocked edges, a lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
High-waisted shorts in a textured weave with fake welt pockets front and back, a fake fly and slits in the sides. Wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One outer compartment with a zip at the front and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 8x28x35 cm.

prod_name: SB Henry water resi ski jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Soft, double-layered hairband with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.
V-neck top in woven fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an open back with ties at the top.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with a quilted shaft that has a zip on the inside. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a slight sheen. V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with a large, decorative metal button, and short sleeves.

Shorts in an airy linen and viscose blend with a high waist with pleats and a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners. Concealed pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Metal hoop earrings with a textured finish. Diameter approx. 4 cm.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton containing some cashmere with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the top and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Alice bands in acrylic. One wide, solid colour Alice band and one patterned, narrower one.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.
Wide, patterned jersey hairband with a decorative knot at the front.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Baby Exclusive. Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and button placket, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie detail, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with pleats at the top and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with gentle gathers and buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist with gathers for added width. Unlined.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a padded edge and tongue and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in an airy jacquard weave made partly from recycled polyester. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and a smocked hem. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft, gently draping satin with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Skirt in a lightly crêped viscose weave with pleats on one side at the top, a concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Jersey inner skirt.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with embroidery, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft moss knit with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, decorative straps at the top, a lined gusset, narrow sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
